alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 11:34PM CDT until April 23 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1130 PM MDT. * At 1032 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Towner to 10 miles south of Granada, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Syracuse. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
